text: nabivarun (magin obage mutun mittan) veta allah porondu laba gat avasthavedi (ovunta) “dharmayada, gnanayada ma obata laba di ættemi. (min) pasuvada oba ata æti dæya satyaya karana ek nabivarayeku pæminenne nam ohuva oba ættenma visvasa kara, niyata vasayenma ohuta udav kala yutuya” (yayi pævasimen anaturuva “meya) obat sthira karannehuda? mage mema niyogaya pili gattehuda?”yi vimasumata, ovun “api (eya) bara gattemu” yayima pævasuha. eyata (deviyan “meyata) oba saksi daranu. mamat oba samaga saksikaruvangen keneku bavata sitinnemi” yayi pævasuveya
